TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content: For your entertainment pleasure, all Youtube videos that address 0.90
I'm hyped now. Really looking forward to all of the features. A question though, will there be a Mk3 loading ramp tail piece?

For your entertainment pleasure, all Youtube videos that address 0.90

That's a little disingenuous. There are in fact many vids that cover .90's various features. Some of them neatly tie info together from all the various sources through which squad released information. Just because someone is not on Squad's approved list of youtubers doesn't mean they cannot "address 0.90".

And here is an ACTUAL preview vid. (So much for embargoes, lol).

Edited December 14, 2014 by Sandworm

So, uhm, I guess you didn't notice WinterOwl's video is in my playlist?

The reason we know exactly which videos preview KSP 0.90 with footage is because that version is still in experimentals and only a small number of people have access to it for testing or media purposes. The group of people who are then allowed to release videos on it is even smaller.
